Sentencas: We report for the first time a combined experimental and computational study of oxygen ion transport and the effects of doping in Ba3Ti3O6(BO3)(2), a promising oxyborate for solid-oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Oxygen Ion Transport and Effects of Doping in Ba3Ti3O6(BO3)2

Sentencas: Undoped and doped samples were prepared by solid-state reaction and characterized using X-ray diffraction and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Oxygen Ion Transport and Effects of Doping in Ba3Ti3O6(BO3)2

Sentencas: We find that the undoped sample already has a conductivity level that is quite high, about 1.46 X 10(-4)
Titulo: Oxygen Ion Transport and Effects of Doping in Ba3Ti3O6(BO3)2

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Oxygen Ion Transport and Effects of Doping in Ba3Ti3O6(BO3)2

Sentencas: Partial replacement of Ba2+ or Ti4+ by subvalent elements, Ba(3-x)A(x)Ti(3)O(6)(BO3)(2) (A = Na+, K+) and Ba3Ti3-xMxO6(BO3)(2) (M = Mg3+, In3+, Sb3+), leads to reduced conductivity; whereas partial replacenient of Ti4+ by supervalent elements, Ba(3)Ti(3-x)A(3)O(6)(BO3)(2) (M = Nb5+, Ta5+), increases the conductivity.
Titulo: Oxygen Ion Transport and Effects of Doping in Ba3Ti3O6(BO3)2

Sentencas: The measured activation energy is in the range 0.99-1.09 eV for the doped samples (compared to 1.02 eV of the undoped one).
Titulo: Oxygen Ion Transport and Effects of Doping in Ba3Ti3O6(BO3)2

Sentencas: The transport properties can be understood in terms of the presence of oxygen and barium vacancies in high concentrations as well as oxygen inteistitials as observed in hybrid density-functional defect calculations.
Titulo: Oxygen Ion Transport and Effects of Doping in Ba3Ti3O6(BO3)2
